value.title: StarCraft 2: 8x DRONE DROP Spine Crawler Rush?! (uThermal vs Mixu)
value.excerpt: Ridiculous series of high level StarCraft 2 between uThermal (Terran) and Mixu (Zerg). Rather than letting uThermal go for a Planetary Fortress Rush, Mixu decides to cheese him back with an insane Drone drop.
